plot: Underground Resistance's R1 virus is passed from person to person through a series of violent encounters. A Top 40 radio programming director falls victim.
title: Underground Resistance Bastille Day
plot_es: Underground Resistance's R1 virus is passed from person to person through a series of violent encounters. A Top 40 radio programming director falls victim.
plot_en: Underground Resistance's R1 virus is passed from person to person through a series of violent encounters. A Top 40 radio programming director falls victim.
